mapper.sql: SELECT os.`office_staff_id` , os.`office_address`,os.`office_staff_name`, COUNT(bq.`quotation_id`) AS quotation_count,COUNT(bc.contract_id) AS contract_count, SUM(IFNULL(bqd.`details_price` * bqd.`number`,0) + IFNULL(bod.`details_price` * bod.number ,0) + IFNULL(bpd.`details_price` * bpd.`number`,0)) AS quotation_price, SUM(bc.`contract_price`) AS contract_price, SUM(bc.`repaymentAmount`) AS repayment_amount, SUM(IFNULL(bqd1.`details_price` * bqd1.`number`,0) + IFNULL(bod1.`details_price` * bod1.number ,0) + IFNULL(bpd1.`details_price` * bpd1.`number`,0)) AS sing_quotation_price FROM office_staff os LEFT JOIN busi_quotation bq ON bq.`staff_id` = os.`office_staff_id` LEFT JOIN busi_quotation_details bqd ON bqd.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` LEFT JOIN busi_outsourcing_details bod ON bod.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` LEFT JOIN busi_parts_details bpd ON bpd.`quotation_id` = bq.`quotation_id` LEFT JOIN busi_contract bc ON bq.`quotation_id` = bc.`qutation_id` LEFT JOIN busi_quotation bq1 ON bq1.`quotation_id` = bc.`qutation_id` LEFT JOIN busi_quotation_details bqd1 ON bqd1.quotation_id = bq1.`quotation_id` LEFT JOIN busi_outsourcing_details bod1 ON bod1.quotation_id = bq1.`quotation_id` LEFT JOIN busi_parts_details bpd1 ON bpd1.`quotation_id` = bq1.`quotation_id` GROUP BY os.office_staff_id ORDER BY os.`office_address` ASC
